name: Mr. Joseph P. GUARRASI, J.D., Petitioner v. Honorable Albert J. CEPPARULO and the Bucks County Court of Common Pleas, Respondents

parties: Mr. Joseph P. GUARRASI, J.D., Petitioner v. Honorable Albert J. CEPPARULO and the Bucks County Court of Common Pleas, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of November, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Protho-notary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
125 A.3d 771
Mr. Joseph P. GUARRASI, J.D., Petitioner v. Honorable Albert J. CEPPARULO and the Bucks County Court of Common Pleas, Respondents.
No. 141 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 13, 2015.
